metadata.description: Naming prefix for each new resource created. 3-char min, 8-char max, lowercase alphanumeric
The resource ID of the subnet for the SfB front-end servers
The network name
The FQDN of one of the SQL servers in the AlwaysOn Cluster
The name of the SQL always-on availability group
The IP or fqdn of the DNS server you want to update. Typically, this is one of your AD servers.
The certificate authority path. Should be in the form of: 'srvdc-dc-1.contoso.com\contoso-srvdc-dc-1-CA'
Type of new Storage Accounts (Standard_LRS, Standard_GRS, Standard_RAGRS or Premium_LRS) to be created to store VM disks
Size of the Skype for Business front-end VMs to be created
DNS domain name for existing Active Directory domain
Netbios name for existing Active Directory domain
Name of the Administrator of the existing Active Directory Domain
Password for the Administrator account of the existing Active Directory Domain
The filename of the Skype for Business ISO
The name of the mod rewrite MSI
Name of the prerequisites installation DSC modules zip file
URL to install script
URL to edge node prep script
The name of the Skype for Business cumulative update installer
The URL of the Skype for Business files container
The share server FQDN
The share name
The ip address of load balancer for SfB front-end
The subnet for the Edge VM network

settings.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -file ', variables('installScriptName'), ' -AdminUser ', parameters('adminUsername'), ' -adminPassword ', parameters('adminPassword'),' -DomainName ', parameters('DomainName'), ' -BaseResourceURI ', parameters('workloadsLocation'), ' -isoName ', parameters('sfbIsoFileName') , ' -AzCopyPackageName MicrosoftAzureStorageTools.msi ', ' -SilverlightPackageName Silverlight.exe ', ' -SqlServerPSName SqlServer.zip ', ' -modRewritePackageName ', parameters('modRewriteMSIName'), ' -SqlServerFQDN ', parameters('SqlServerFQDN'), ' -SqlAG ' , parameters('SqlAG'), ' -LBIPAddress ', parameters('feLBIPAddress'), ' -DNSserver ', parameters('DNSserver'), ' -ShareFqdn ', parameters('shareServerFQDN'), ' -shareName ', parameters('shareName'), ' -CA ', parameters('CA'), ' -cmuPackageName ', parameters('sfbCMUPackageName'), ' -WorkloadsZipName ', parameters('sfbPrereqModulesFileName'), ' -FirstFE ', parameters('feNodes')[0], ' -SecondFE ', parameters('feNodes')[1], ' -ThirdFE ', parameters('feNodes')[2], ' -FirstEdge ', parameters('edgeNodes')[0], ' -SecondEdge ', parameters('edgeNodes')[1], ' -FirstEdgeInternal ', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces',concat(variables('edgeNicPrefix'), '01'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, ' -FirstEdgeExternal ', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces',concat(variables('edgeNicPrefixExternal'), '01'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, ' -SecondEdgeInternal ', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces',concat(variables('edgeNicPrefix'), '02'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, ' -SecondEdgeExternal ', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces',concat(variables('edgeNicPrefixExternal'), '02'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, ' -EdgePoolFQDN ', variables('EdgePoolFQDN'), ' -FirstEdgePoolIP ', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses',variables('firstEdgePublicIPName'))).IpAddress, ' -SecondEdgePoolIP ', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses',variables('secondEdgePublicIPName'))).IpAddress, ' -Verbose')]
